description: This source file defines a utility class 'SqliteHealth' that checks the existence of core tables in an SQLite database used within the fleet management system. It includes a method to verify whether essential tables like 'vehicles', 'groups', and 'events' are present, aiding in runtime diagnostics.

classes.name: SqliteHealth
classes.description: A utility class for verifying the initialization and presence of core tables in the SQLite database used by the application.

methods.name: hasCoreTables
methods.description: Checks if the 'vehicles', 'groups', and 'events' tables exist in the database, returning true if all are present.
